name: crying man fight
description:
(CONTROLS)

(MAIN CTRLS) A- Move Right D- Move Left W- Jump V- Shoot Right N-Shoot Left

(ALT CTRLS) Right Arrow- Move Right, Left Arrow- Move Left, Space- Jump, Arrow- Shoot Right, Down Arrow- Shoot Left.

This Will Most Likely Not Be Mobile Compatible Project

Should I Add More Abilities??? Like A Dash Or Crouch Or Something If This Gets 50 Views, I Will Create Abilities And Special Moves On The Scratch Version And This Version.

A game developed on the Scratch Platform I might make more of these random boss games on scratch then upload them on here idk though. I won't update it unless there is a glitch or problem with the game, or a really good suggestion.

I'm not making any money off of this so it would be most appreciated if you would check out some of the links below and support me on Scratch, and YouTube

Link to the game on Scratch: crying man fight on Scratch (mit.edu)

Link to YouTube Channel: Loubeano - YouTube

Link to my scratch account: Loubeano on Scratch (mit.edu)
